sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react';
import './App.css';

import { Icon, Menu, Segment, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react'

export default class App extends Component {
  state = {
    activeItem: '',
  }

  handleItemClick = (e, { name }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name })
  render() {
    const { activeItem } = this.state

    return (
      <Segment style={{height: 1000}}>
        <Segment attached='top' style={{height: '50%'}}>
        vis goes here
        </Segment>
        <Segment attached placeholder={activeItem !== ''} >
          {this.state.activeItem}
            <Button
              name='new-tab'
              onClick={() => this.setState({activeItem: ''})}
            >
              <Icon name='add' />
              Expand
            </Button>
        </Segment>

        <Segment attached='bottom'>
          <Menu>
          <Menu.Item name='crescent step 1' active={activeItem === 'crescent step 1'} onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
            Active Project
          </Menu.Item>

          <Menu.Item name='crescent step 2' active={activeItem === 'crescent step 2'} onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
            Project #2
          </Menu.Item>

          <Menu.Item name='crescent step 3' active={activeItem === 'crescent step 3'} onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
            Project #3
          </Menu.Item>
          </Menu>
        </Segment>
      </Segment>
    )
  }
}
